Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hofton Avenue, east of the Lelion Parkway intersection.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the intersection with Lelion Parkway to the west. Lelion Parkway runs through the center part of the northwestern quadrant of town, passing by all the major shops and stores in the area. On the south, you can see the large Evenborough Inn, where numerous travelers stop off for a good evening's rest.
